name: The Big Bang Theory (Season 10)
info:
• 中文名: 生活大爆炸 第十季
  • 放送星期: 星期一
  • 配角: Brian George
  • 集数: 24
  • 开始: 2016-09-19
  • 类型: 喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • wiki: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Big_Bang_Theory_(season_10)

eps.name: The Conjugal Conjecture
eps.desc: As Leonard and Penny attempt to hold another wedding ceremony everyone can attend, they have to deal with Penny's family arriving and Leonard's father spending the night with Sheldon's mother.

eps.name: The Military Miniaturization
eps.desc: Howard is visited by an Air Force colonel regarding his invention. Penny accidentally lets it slip to her co-workers Bernadette's secret that she is pregnant.

eps.name: The Dependence Transcendence
eps.desc: Bernadette confides to Raj she isn't sure if she's ready to be a mother. Penny accompanies Amy to a university mixer, and Sheldon goes to unusual extremes to assist Howard with his military project.

eps.name: The Cohabitation Experimentation
eps.desc: When Amy must vacate her apartment for repairs, living arrangements are made with Leonard, Sheldon, and Penny. Howard and Bernadette don't want to know the sex of their baby, but Raj finds out.

eps.name: The Hot Tub Contamination
eps.desc: Sheldon and Amy go through a period of adjustment with their new living arrangement. Howard and Bernadette are forced to vacation at home when she falls ill and keep it a secret, unaware Raj and Stuart planned to use their hot tub.

eps.name: The Fetal Kick Catalyst
eps.desc:
Sheldon throws a brunch to surprise Amy, who wanted to invite guests over. Stuart, Bert from the geology lab, and a Romanian neighbor from downstairs attend. Stuart is insulted when he learns that the brunch was a test run before they invited others over; however, Sheldon apologizes and they get drunk together complementing each other and annoying Amy. Penny gets invited to a Van Nuys Comic-Con event to sign autographs since she starred in two Serial Apeist movies. She is humiliated by fans about her poor acting ability and loving her topless shower scene. Leonard ends up holding court describing how he married such an attractive woman. Howard finally feels the baby kick. He and Raj go shopping, buying a crib and a minivan, but Howard throws his back out and they drive to the ER.

Title reference: Howard's spending spree after feeling the baby kick for the first time.

eps.name: The Veracity Elasticity
eps.desc:
After filming an episode of 'Fun with Flags' it's revealed Amy's apartment was repaired weeks ago, but she is lying to Sheldon to keep them living together. Sheldon forgives her and wants to keep living with her, but is torn about where he really belongs. Standing between Apartment 4A and Apartment 4B like Buridan's ass, Amy engages him in conversation, causing him to follow her home. Meanwhile, Penny has been secretly moving Leonard's collectibles into storage. He confronts her but agrees she should decorate their bedroom while his stuff goes into Sheldon's old room. Penny gives the bedroom a feminine look, some of which Leonard hides in Apartment 4B.

Title reference: Amy stretching the truth about her old apartment being repaired.

eps.name: The Brain Bowl Incubation
eps.desc:
Amy uses skin cells from her and Sheldon to produce some primitive brain cells using their joint DNA. This inspires Sheldon to want to have a child with Amy, though she is not enthusiastic about his plan. Raj becomes attracted to Isabella, a cleaning woman at his lab, and fixes her dinner. She is insulted when she discovers that Raj told his friends that she was a fellow astronomer, but agrees to another date.

Title reference: Sheldon and Amy mix their DNA and incubate some brain cells.

eps.name: The Geology Elevation
eps.desc:
Sheldon learns that Bert has won a MacArthur Fellowship prize for his work on endolithic organisms, and has to deal with his jealousy. The rest of the group discuss their own internal jealousies. Professor Hawking calls Sheldon and explains that even he gets jealous. In order to make peace, Sheldon goes with Bert to a taping of The Ellen DeGeneres Show. Meanwhile, Howard builds a remote controlled miniature Stephen Hawking, and while everyone (except Kripke) thinks it is offensive, Hawking actually likes the idea.

Title reference: Bert's geology research gets more attention than Sheldon's work.

eps.name: The Property Division Collision
eps.desc:
After Sheldon and Amy take the ugly portrait of Penny and Amy to Leonard and Penny's apartment, the guys start to divide up their belongings. When Sheldon tries to take everything, a dispute over the official apartment flag starts a war between Sheldon and Leonard. Sheldon rents out his old room to an old guy named Theodore (Christopher Lloyd) who helps them to realize that Sheldon moving out is affecting both of them deeply, leading to Sheldon allowing Leonard to keep the flag. Stuart brings Howard and Bernadette a gift and ends up moving back in since he was evicted from his apartment. Stuart plans to help them out to justify his moving in, starting a war with Raj who claims the right to help them. Finally, Bernadette's water breaks and everyone heads to the hospital for the arrival of their baby.

Title reference: The title refers to Leonard and Sheldon's dispute over dividing their property.

eps.name: The Birthday Synchronicity
eps.desc:
The birth of Bernadette and Howard's baby, Halley, is on Amy's birthday, which interferes with Sheldon and Amy's annual coitus. Sheldon is also upset Amy went to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter without him. Raj accidentally reveals it's a girl and is kicked out of the Wolowitz house. At the hospital waiting, the friends all reminisce how much has changed in ten years though Raj feels he's done the least which further upsets him. Halley Wolowitz is born and Raj is honored to be her godfather while the baby's cry sounds uncannily like her grandmother Debbie Wolowitz. Sheldon and Amy go to the theme park together, which is foreplay to Sheldon, and rush into their apartment to have their birthday coitus.

Title reference: Halley Wolowitz is born on the same day as Amy's birthday.

eps.name: The Holiday Summation
eps.desc:
Each couple describes what they did over the holidays. Sheldon and Amy visited Mary, who is fine that they live together, thinking Sheldon would not have gotten a girlfriend strange enough to care for him. This insulted Sheldon and in retaliation got his ear pierced, though he was made to take it out. Leonard and Penny had a terrible time chopping down a Christmas tree and bringing it home, and it turned out to have a squirrel living in it. Bernadette could not get the baby to stop crying and feared it was because she is not a good mother. However, she was able to get Halley asleep by sleeping in the crib with her. Stuart visited his grandmother in Bakersfield, though everyone pretends to have fallen asleep from listening to him as a joke. ---

Title reference: Stories are told about what happened during the holidays.

eps.name: The Romance Recalibration
eps.desc:
Penny feels Leonard is not putting enough effort into their relationship now that they are married. Leonard thinks that he is the only one putting in any effort at all. Angrily, Penny takes Amy with her on a spa weekend. Sheldon and Leonard soon follow, solving the problem by having Sheldon create a Relationship Agreement for Leonard and Penny just like Sheldon and Amy's. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj create a path in the baby's room to the crib without causing the floor boards to squeak thus disturbing baby Halley with an overcomplicated solution.

Title reference: Leonard and Penny reorganizing their relationship for more romance.

eps.name: The Emotion Detection Automation
eps.desc:
Sheldon wants to understand others' emotions better and gets an experimental machine from MIT that reads other people for him. It reveals Leonard is angry about Penny inviting her ex-drug dealing brother to stay with them while he applies for a job at her pharmaceutical company. Sheldon is upset the machine works so well as he feels he cannot understand others himself though Amy comforts him. Leonard and Penny apologize for blaming him for their fight while Penny will still blame Leonard to her family as the reason why Randall cannot stay with her.

Meanwhile, Raj calls together several of his ex-girlfriends to find out why he's still single. Emily Sweeney, Lucy, Claire and Emily the deaf woman, leave him feeling down since they all found better relationships after they dumped him. Howard promises if things don't work out with Bernadette he'll become Raj's partner.

Title reference: Sheldon's machine prototype to reveal emotions.

eps.name: The Locomotion Reverberation
eps.desc:
Sheldon, Leonard and Howard finally finish their guidance system for the military, but Sheldon thinks it could be even smaller. To distract him Leonard gives him a trip to be a train conductor in Nevada. The trip greatly excites Sheldon, becoming all he thinks about, getting a train engine in his apartment to work on claiming he prefers it over physics. After seeing Sheldon's theory, Colonel Williams orders his smaller version to be made instead so Leonard and Howard try and get him to come back, Howard promising to teach him the mechanics in exchange for his help.

Meanwhile, Penny and Amy take Bernadette out to get her mind off motherhood duties but the new baby has made Penny and Amy sad over the slow progress in their own relationships. Raj and Stuart babysit Halley while having a few minor mishaps.

Title reference: Sheldon's train trip taking over his thoughts.

eps.name: The Allowance Evaporation
eps.desc:
Sheldon and Amy are out on a date when Bert the geologist is stood up. He says he admires them other than their only having sex once a year. Amy is angry Sheldon told everyone at the university. Sheldon apologizes, now understanding the need for privacy, also informing Amy of one of his private secrets that he got his driver's license two years ago but lets her chauffeur him to feel important.

Meanwhile, Raj's father has stopped trying to find him a wife since Raj still relies on him to pay for everything. Raj's friends make him realize he is spoiled. Raj decides to stop taking the money to prove everyone wrong, though his father is very happy.

Title reference: Raj stops taking an allowance from his father.

eps.name: The Comic-Con Conundrum
eps.desc:
Raj appoints Sheldon as his financial manager and is told he cannot afford to go to San Diego Comic-Con this year. Raj tries selling his collectibles and working for Stuart to make extra money. Howard does a bunch of chores so Bernadette will let him leave for five days. Penny says she wants to go with the guys to make Leonard happy though they both think she'd be miserable, leading to tension until Sheldon and Amy reveal the truth. Howard and Bernadette try to pay Raj for babysitting Halley but he rejects the money and chance to go. Leonard also decides to stay home to be with Penny and Howard stays with his family. Sheldon still plans on going, amusing Amy with his attempt to have her join him.

Title reference: Raj, Howard and Leonard's struggles with going to Comic-Con.

eps.name: The Escape Hatch Identification
eps.desc:
Raj cannot afford his apartment so Leonard and Penny temporarily give him Sheldon's old room. Sheldon is uncomfortable, calling Beverly to find out why. She claims he views his old room as an escape hatch should things go wrong with Amy, and that Leonard and Penny need a roommate to distract themselves from their own relationship problems. The fighting leads to Raj leaving and scaring Howard, Bernadette and Stuart in the middle of the night. The couples are able to work through the issues and Raj is invited back to stay with Leonard and Penny.
Title reference: Leonard's mother helping Sheldon find his metaphorical "escape hatch", his old room in Penny and Leonard's apartment.

eps.name: The Collaboration Fluctuation
eps.desc:
Sheldon and Amy attempt to analyze the Copenhagen interpretation using the neurobiology of decision-making. Professionally collaborating for the first time, they try to be nice for the sake of their relationship, but their work is of poor quality. They find that insulting each other makes them more creative, so they compile a list of topics that they can insult each other with. Meanwhile, Penny and Raj bond over girly things, causing Leonard to feel left out. Howard and Bernadette suggest that he talk to them, but Raj and Penny talk about Leonard's feelings while ignoring him.
Title reference: Sheldon and Amy collaborating, first cooperating then arguing.

eps.name: The Recollection Dissipation
eps.desc:
Sheldon pushes himself to work on his project with Amy and the guidance system with Howard and Leonard on the same day. He catches a cold and wakes up the next day, half-naked, with no memory of what he did since he took cold medicine. His notebook of classified information on the military project is gone. Tracking his phone, they realize Sheldon went to a Western-themed bar. He gets the notebook back but learns he told everyone there about the project, after making them pinky swear to secrecy. Meanwhile, Bernadette feels guilty about leaving the baby when she returns to work soon. Howard thinks she is mad at him but makes her feel better by saying they can change their choices if they want and Halley won't remember this anyway. Amy plays Soft Kitty for Sheldon in different languages using an autoharp.
Title reference: Sheldon losing his memory of the day.

eps.name: The Separation Agitation
eps.desc:
Bert the geologist interrupts the latest "Fun With Flags" episode to tell everyone he has a girlfriend now, a personal trainer named Rebecca. He brings her to meet the gang but it becomes clear she is only with Bert for his grant money. They convince him to dump her. However, he misses her, calling "Fun With Flags" again to say he got her back by purchasing her a jet ski. Meanwhile, Howard, Bernadette and Stuart are all upset about leaving Halley at the university's daycare. Howard and Stuart take her out the first day to go to an aquarium.
Title reference: The agitation felt by separating from baby Halley.

eps.name: The Cognition Regeneration
eps.desc:
Sheldon loses his edge at online gaming and tries several new tasks to keep his mind sharp: baking with Raj, juggling with Howard, and riding a unicycle. Amy says maybe he should just focus on living well, though Sheldon wants to try stilts. Penny runs into her ex-boyfriend Zack, who offers her a job at his menu company. Penny likes the idea and Leonard reluctantly supports her. However, Zack says she cannot have the job as his fiance thinks it is a stupid idea for him to work with an ex-girlfriend. Meanwhile, Howard is tired of Bernadette making fun of his magic tricks and finds her old ventriloquist dummy, though she uses it to scare Howard.
Title reference: Sheldon trying to keep his mind sharp.

eps.name: The Gyroscopic Collapse
eps.desc:
Leonard, Howard and Sheldon finish their gyroscope for the Air Force, only to have it confiscated by the military for classified reasons. The loss of the project causes Howard to become clingy with Bernadette, though he reminds her she's behaved in a similar manner after setbacks at her own job. Raj plans to move out of Leonard and Penny's apartment, and into a room above Bert's garage. Amy is offered a summer position as a guest researcher at Princeton. Though Sheldon initially takes the news badly, he ultimately agrees she should accept the offer.
Title reference: The loss of the gyroscope project.

eps.name: The Long Distance Dissonance
eps.desc: With Amy away, Sheldon's old admirer Ramona Nowitzki (from season 2) begins to hang around Sheldon at Caltech and later his home. The rest of the gang become convinced she is pursuing Sheldon, alarming Amy. They do their best to keep her away from him, even following her to her car after dinner as a group. Sheldon doesn't believe Ramona is romantically interested in him. When he asks her about it in his office, she kisses him. Sheldon immediately departs and flies to New Jersey, proposing to Amy the second she answers the door.
